column2: Wireframing, Prototyping, User Research, Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, Usability Testing, Interaction Design, Information Architecture, Empathy Mapping
column3: As a UX Designer, you will create intuitive and engaging user experiences for digital products. You will conduct user research, develop personas, design wireframes and prototypes, and perform usability testing to refine interfaces. Collaborating with product managers, developers, and stakeholders, you will ensure designs are user-centered, accessible, and aligned with business goals. Your work will focus on solving user pain points and delivering seamless, visually appealing interactions across web and mobile platforms.

column2: Java, Python, SQL, Git, Problem Solving
column3: Designs, develops, and maintains software applications, ensuring functionality, performance, and scalability.

column2: NLP, Generative AI, Python, ChatGPT, Prompt Design
column3: Designs, tests, and optimizes prompts to improve the performance and accuracy of large language models and AI chatbots.
